name: Exhibition "Not All Who Wander" by Amanda Christina
description:
As a self-taught oil painter, Christina's work is rooted in personal experience and emotional exploration, inspired by the idea of finding light in darkness and reminding viewers to seek hope even in difficult times. 

Her paintings feature hidden encouraging words, northern landscapes shaped by memories at the family cottage, and ethereal orbs symbolizing her late father, whose presence continues to guide her creative expression, inviting viewers on a journey of reflection, healing, and the pursuit of light amidst shadows.
